articles.title: Ukraine accuses Russia of shelling nuclear plant again - Reuters
articles.description: Ukraine accused Russia on Sunday of again shelling Europe's largest nuclear power plant, the Zaporizhzhia, and called for new international sanctions on Moscow for "nuclear terror".

articles.title: What India needs to learn from Europe's rapid EV adoption - Economic Times
articles.description: Traditionalists are facing the heat. New market entrants, including brands such as Tesla, NIO, or Polestar, are starting to eat into market share. Tesla, for instance, sold almost 936,000 EVs globally in 2021.
articles.content: Europe is clearly outpacing global peers in electrifying its automotive sector, with adoption pegged at 16% of all new car sales in the region by 2025. By 2030, almost half of the annual sales would … [+2398 chars]

articles.title: Berkshire Hathaway posts $43.8 billion loss as stock holdings tumble - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Rising interest rates and dividend payouts helped insurance businesses generate more money from investments, while the strengthening US dollar boosted profit from European and Japanese debt investments
articles.content:
